languages.text: {n}Маражай с разъяренным шипением замахивается — и все же неимоверным усилием воли сдерживает себя и убирает руку.{/n} "Еще раз я услышу про жалость, {name} — и ты горько, горько пожалеешь об этом. Я закончил с тобой говорить".

{n}With an enraged hiss, Marazhai whips back his arm as if to slap you — and then, by an incredible force of will, restrains himself and lowers his arm.{/n} "Mention the word 'pity' to me once more, {name}, and you will bitterly, bitterly regret it. Our conversation is over."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай с разъяренным шипением замахивается — и все же неимоверным усилием воли сдерживает себя и убирает руку.{/n} "Еще раз я услышу про жалость, {name} — и ты горько, горько пожалеешь об этом. Я закончил с тобой говорить".

traits.locale_text: {n}With an enraged hiss, Marazhai whips back his arm as if to slap you — and then, by an incredible force of will, restrains himself and lowers his arm.{/n} "Mention the word 'pity' to me once more, {name}, and you will bitterly, bitterly regret it. Our conversation is over."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}With an enraged hiss, Marazhai whips back his arm as if to slap you — and then, by an incredible force of will, restrains himself and lowers his arm.{/n} "Mention the word 'pity' to me once more, {name}, and you will bitterly, bitterly regret it. Our conversation is over."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Con un siseo furioso, Marazhai levanta el brazo como si fuera a abofetearte, pero, con tremendo esfuerzo de voluntad, se contiene y lo baja.{/n} «Vuelve a hablarme de "lástima" y lo lamentarás, {name}. Vaya si lo lamentarás. Esta conversación ha terminado».
languages.original_text: {n}With an enraged hiss, Marazhai whips back his arm as if to slap you — and then, by an incredible force of will, restrains himself and lowers his arm.{/n} "Mention the word 'pity' to me once more, {name}, and you will bitterly, bitterly regret it. Our conversation is over."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un siseo furioso, Marazhai levanta el brazo como si fuera a abofetearte, pero, con tremendo esfuerzo de voluntad, se contiene y lo baja.{/n} «Vuelve a hablarme de "lástima" y lo lamentarás, {name}. Vaya si lo lamentarás. Esta conversación ha terminado».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋愤怒地嘶了一声，抬起了胳膊，仿佛要甩你一个耳光。但随即，他以惊人的意志力克制住了自己，放下了手臂。{/n}“如果你再敢提‘可怜’这个词，{name}，你就会非常、非常后悔。这场谈话到此为止了。”
languages.original_text: {n}With an enraged hiss, Marazhai whips back his arm as if to slap you — and then, by an incredible force of will, restrains himself and lowers his arm.{/n} "Mention the word 'pity' to me once more, {name}, and you will bitterly, bitterly regret it. Our conversation is over."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋愤怒地嘶了一声，抬起了胳膊，仿佛要甩你一个耳光。但随即，他以惊人的意志力克制住了自己，放下了手臂。{/n}“如果你再敢提‘可怜’这个词，{name}，你就会非常、非常后悔。这场谈话到此为止了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは怒りのこもった唸り声とともに、あたかもあなたを平手打ちするかのように腕を振り上げる。しかし、信じられないほどの意志の力で自分自身を制止し、腕を下ろした。{/n}「俺にたいして『気の毒に』という言葉は二度と使うなよ、{name}。きっと激しく後悔することになるだろう。話はもう終わりだ」
languages.original_text: {n}With an enraged hiss, Marazhai whips back his arm as if to slap you — and then, by an incredible force of will, restrains himself and lowers his arm.{/n} "Mention the word 'pity' to me once more, {name}, and you will bitterly, bitterly regret it. Our conversation is over."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは怒りのこもった唸り声とともに、あたかもあなたを平手打ちするかのように腕を振り上げる。しかし、信じられないほどの意志の力で自分自身を制止し、腕を下ろした。{/n}「俺にたいして『気の毒に』という言葉は二度と使うなよ、{name}。きっと激しく後悔することになるだろう。話はもう終わりだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Avec un sifflement rageur, Marazhai tend le bras en arrière comme pour vous administrer une gifle retentissante, mais il se fait violence pour maîtriser son accès de colère et interrompre son geste.{/n} « Prononcez encore une seule fois le mot "pitié" devant moi, {name}, et vous le regretterez amèrement. Sur ce, cette conversation est terminée. »
languages.original_text: {n}With an enraged hiss, Marazhai whips back his arm as if to slap you — and then, by an incredible force of will, restrains himself and lowers his arm.{/n} "Mention the word 'pity' to me once more, {name}, and you will bitterly, bitterly regret it. Our conversation is over."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un sifflement rageur, Marazhai tend le bras en arrière comme pour vous administrer une gifle retentissante, mais il se fait violence pour maîtriser son accès de colère et interrompre son geste.{/n} « Prononcez encore une seule fois le mot "pitié" devant moi, {name}, et vous le regretterez amèrement. Sur ce, cette conversation est terminée. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Mit einem zornigen Zischen zieht Marazhai seinen Arm zurück, als würde er dir eine Ohrfeige verpassen wollen — doch dann zügelt er sich mit gewaltiger Willensanstrengung und senkt den Arm.{/n} "Erwähnt mir gegenüber noch einmal das Wort 'Mitleid', {name}, und Ihr werdet es bitter, bitter bereuen. Unser Gespräch ist beendet."
languages.original_text: {n}With an enraged hiss, Marazhai whips back his arm as if to slap you — and then, by an incredible force of will, restrains himself and lowers his arm.{/n} "Mention the word 'pity' to me once more, {name}, and you will bitterly, bitterly regret it. Our conversation is over."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem zornigen Zischen zieht Marazhai seinen Arm zurück, als würde er dir eine Ohrfeige verpassen wollen — doch dann zügelt er sich mit gewaltiger Willensanstrengung und senkt den Arm.{/n} "Erwähnt mir gegenüber noch einmal das Wort 'Mitleid', {name}, und Ihr werdet es bitter, bitter bereuen. Unser Gespräch ist beendet."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}With an enraged hiss, Marazhai whips back his arm as if to slap you — and then, by an incredible force of will, restrains himself and lowers his arm.{/n} "Mention the word 'pity' to me once more, , and you will bitterly, bitterly regret it. Our conversation is over."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, öfkeli bir tıslama çıkarıp kolunu sana vuracakmış gibi geri atıyor. Ardından muazzam bir irade gücüyle kendine hâkim olup kolunu indiriyor.{/n} "Bir daha bana "acıdım" diyecek olursan {name}, seni çok fena yaparım. Bu konuşma bitmiştir."
languages.original_text: {n}With an enraged hiss, Marazhai whips back his arm as if to slap you — and then, by an incredible force of will, restrains himself and lowers his arm.{/n} "Mention the word 'pity' to me once more, {name}, and you will bitterly, bitterly regret it. Our conversation is over."

traits.locale_text: {n}Öfkeli bir tıslamayla Marazhai, kolunu sana vuracakmış gibi geri atıyor. Ardından muazzam bir irade gücüyle kendine hâkim olup kolunu indiriyor.{/n} "Bir daha bana "acımak" diyecek olursan {name}, seni çok fena yaparım. Konuşma bitmiştir."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
